valueProps.text: Automates time-consuming tax processes, allowing firms to handle more clients without increasing staff.
Helps businesses stay compliant with local tax laws, reducing the risk of penalties.
Enables firms to grow their client base while maintaining operational efficiency through automation.

facts.text: Tax Star is an AI-powered corporate tax software designed for businesses in the UAE.
facts.evidence: Tax Star is an AI-powered corporate tax software designed for businesses in the UAE.

facts.text: Tax Star provides a comprehensive suite of compliance solutions.
facts.evidence: It provides a comprehensive suite of compliance solutions, including corporate tax calculations, financial statement production, e-invoicing, and Zakat calculations for businesses in KSA.

facts.text: Automates tax returns and generates IFRS-compliant financial statements.
facts.evidence: Automates tax returns, generates IFRS-compliant financial statements, and sends smart reminders.

facts.text: Ensures timely and accurate tax return submissions.
facts.evidence: Corporate Tax Calculator: Ensures timely and accurate tax return submissions.

facts.text: Simplifies the creation of financial statements, reducing reliance on manual tools like Word and Excel.
facts.evidence: Simplifies the creation of financial statements, reducing reliance on manual tools like Word and Excel.

facts.text: Alerts users to update registration documents to avoid penalties.
facts.evidence: Document Expiry Reminders: Alerts users to update registration documents to avoid penalties.

facts.text: E-Invoicing ensures invoices are compliant with FTA regulations.
facts.evidence: E-Invoicing: Ensures invoices are compliant with FTA regulations and integrates seamlessly with corporate tax filings.

facts.text: Reduces manual tax calculations, allowing teams to focus on higher-value tasks.
facts.evidence: Automated Workflow: Reduces manual tax calculations, allowing teams to focus on higher-value tasks and increasing efficiency by up to 40%.

facts.text: Centralizes client information and communication, streamlining corporate tax processes.
facts.evidence: Practice Management Tools: Centralizes client information and communication, streamlining corporate tax processes.

facts.text: Offers a free trial for potential users to explore the software.
facts.evidence: It offers a free trial for potential users to explore the software before committing to a purchase.
